name: Interdimensional Struggle
description:
Main Game Mechanic:

You have 4 players that you can "possess"
Each 15 seconds, you will switch to your next player, thus stopping all the action from the last player

Goal:
Find the goal in each player's map and kill at least 48 total enemies

Tip: When you reach a goal you have infinite double jumps
If you lost a player, you can compensate their lost kills by killing the extra enemies in the remaining player mini-levels

How to play:
WASD or Arrow Keys to move up, left, right
Press the Up Arrow or the W key twice to double jump
(When an enemy dies it drops an item which can be picked up and used to double jump. You can only hold one at a time and they despawn after 5 seconds if not picked up so be wise about how you use them)
Tip: Double jump fast to have more height

Use the space bar to "use" the current weapon

Press J to restart a level

Bow Weapon: Shoots arrow that can only pierce through 2 enemies

Sword Weapon: Melee weapon that kills the enemy in front of it

Shield Weapon: When used, the player will dash in the direction they are looking at. Dashing at an enemy will kill them

Boomerang Weapon: Will kill 3 enemies in front of it then return back

Credits:
Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/press-start-font.html
Code: Jed (nodle man#2897)
Art: Lionel (MoldyToeMan#5905)
Sound Effects: Lionel
Oddly satisfying music: Lionel
